timeline.message:
fixed #810: efficient sorted set seeking
* reworked the sorted sets to allow for seeking by using the tailSet method.

timeline.bodyText: Should the number of objects to verify be configurable? Not in this pr, but as a general comment.
timeline.author: apmoriarty

replies.bodyText: I could add that in here.... not too hard to parameterize.
replies.author: ivakegg

timeline.bodyText: Are we sure we want to double the length of the array? ArrayList resizes with (size + size/2).
timeline.author: apmoriarty

timeline.bodyText: There's an opportunity for a try-with-resources block here
timeline.author: apmoriarty
apmoriarty

replies.bodyText: oops, forgot about that one.  Thanks.
replies.author: ivakegg

timeline.message:
re #810: review comment updates.  Includes parameterizing the persist
verification options.
